title: Overwatch 2's Mauga "Felt Pretty Weak" During Free Trial, Will Receive Buffs For Season 8 Launch
description:
Overwatch 2's upcoming new hero, Mauga, looks formidable, but according to player feedback and developer Blizzard's own data from the character's free trial period, he actually proved to be on the weaker side. That's something Blizzard would like to fix ahead of his debut at the start of Season 8 on December 5.

In a blog post discussing Mauga, BlizzCon 2023, and other potential changes coming to the free-to-play hero shooter, Overwatch 2 game director Aaron Keller said Mauga was "on the average to weak side, with him underperforming even more at higher-skill tiers," based on the developer's data from the characters free trial weekend. In order to make Mauga as strong as he looks, the team is looking to buff his survivability and increase his abilit

title: Best MicroSD Card Deals For Steam Deck And Nintendo Switch Ahead Of Black Friday
description:
If you're running out of space on your Nintendo Switch or Steam Deck, it thankfully doesn't cost much to expand your storage. Both handhelds fully support microSD cards, which have become considerably less expensive in recent years, especially for high-capacity cards. Ahead of Black Friday 2023, we rounded up the best microSD card deals you can grab right now.

Some of the best deals are for SanDisk products, with 1TB, 512GB, 256GB, 1

title: Dragon Ball Creator's Sand Land Gets Anime Series On Hulu
description:
Hulu is set to debut Sand Land: The Series in Spring 2024, according to a release from the streaming service. The anime, an extension and expansion of the 2023 movie Sand Land, takes viewers on an exploration of a world grappling with water scarcity and tyrannical rule.

With Mutsumi Tamura voicing Fiend Prince Beelzebub, Kazuhiro Yamaji as Sheriff Rao, Chō as Thief, Satoshi Tsuruoka as General Are, and Nobuo Tobita as Supreme Commander Zeu, the series is directed by Toshihisa Yokoshima and adapted by Hayashi Mori from the original story by Akira Toriyama--the creator of Dragon Ball and Dr. Slump. A synopsis in part reads: "Tired of suffering under the king's rule, Sheriff Rao reaches out to Sand Land's demons for help, and together they set off on a journey to discover the 'Legendary Spring.'"

The anime adaptation for Sand Land was announced after this past summer's Summer Games Fest 2023 reveal of

title: Ready Player One And More Books About Video Games Get Steep Discounts At Amazon
description: Ready Player One is among the most popular video game novels ever written, landing not just on the New York Times Best Seller list, but also getting a movie adaptation from Stephen Spielberg. If you haven't read it or need a gift for the gamer of your family, consider picking it up while it's on sale at Amazon for just eight bucks ahead of Black Friday 2023. You'll also find its sequel on sale for $11 as well as deals on Ernest Cline's other gaming novel and a superb 2022 novel that follows the lives of two game designers.

title: Thor Director Jokes That His Star Wars Movie Will "Piss People Off"
description:
Thor director Taika Waititi is directing a Star Wars movie, and he's now provided another update on what fans can expect, but it's still early days and he doesn't have much to say just yet. Speaking to Variety, Waititi said, "It will be... dramatic pause... a Taika Waititi film."

Waititi joked, "It's gonna piss people off."

Waititi previously said his Star Wars movie was "still marinating." He is not only directing the movie but also writing it, and with the WGA strike now over, he is free to get back to work on it.

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Coral Island Romance Options And Their Favorite Gifts
description:
Farming and fixing up Coral Island may be the game's central focus, but sometimes you really want someone to share that life with. Luckily, you have a lot of Coral Island romance options, and who you pursue is entirely up to you. With so many options, it's understandable if you have some trouble picking the right sweetheart, but we can at least take some of the pressure off by sharing everything you need to know about them below.

All romance options in Coral Island

While romance options have expanded in past updates and may continue to do so in the future, there are currently 28 romance options in Coral Island. You can begin to date a character when you get their hearts to level 8. You raise their relationship level by chatting with them frequently--once per in-game day will do the trick--and giving them their favorite gifts. Afterward, you'll be able to start a relationship

title: WoW: Dragonflight Will Soon Let Players Run Dungeons With NPC Companions
description:
World of Warcraft: Dragonflight's next update, Seeds of Renewal, has been revealed, and in addition unlocking dragonriding across all of Azeroth, it will allow for players to run dungeons all on their own, albeit with a little help from some NPC followers.

Dungeons in WoW typically require a five-person group, with one tank, one healer, and three DPS. The upcoming addition of Follower Dungeons, as they are called, puts a new spin on the formula. Follower Dungeons will let players put NPCs in roles usually reserved for other players in a dungeon party. This feature will work with all eight of Dragonflight's normal-difficulty dungeons, with a difficulty that will scale depending on the number of human players in a party.

More #Dragonflight is still to

title: CoD: Modern Warfare 3 Adds Outlines Around Enemies And Teammates In New Test
description:
The first playlist update for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III has arrived, bringing with it a new "experimental" playlist featuring player outlines that help them stand out in the environment.

In this experimental playlist, enemies have a very subtle red outline around them. Beyond this, a blue outline has been added to all teammates across core multiplayer modes. Players can even seen teammates through walls if they are close enough.

Enemy outlines, as mentioned, are much more subtle and are not visible through walls. You can see examples of the changes in the videos further down the page from CharlieIntel.

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Why Hunger Games Prequel Is A "Completely Distinct And Fresh" Direction For The Franchise, Producer Says
description:
It would probably be fair to say that the Hunger Games movie franchise is producer Nina Jacobson's baby. After she was fired from her role running Buena Vista Pictures for Disney in 2006, Jacobson struck out on her own with her production company, Color Force, and the original Hunger Games film was among the first that the company produced. That decision worked out pretty well, obviously.

Ahead of the release of the excellent franchise prequel, The Hunger Games: A Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes, I spoke with Jacobson about coming back to a franchise that she thought was over and done with, and how this prequel manages to dramatically change up the franchise formula in the best ways.

"We really thought we had told our stories and that we were done making Hunger Games movies. We did not have a big plan for any prequels or

title: Baldur's Gate 3 Physical Deluxe Edition Announced, And It Has A "F*** Ton Of Discs"
description:
Baldur's Gate 3 will receive a physical deluxe edition, developer Larian Studios has announced, with preorders currently live via Larian's dedicated online store. The deluxe edition is expected to ship in the first quarter of 2024 and is $80.

If you're a fan of discs, the deluxe edition of Larian's hit RPG is for you. Baldur's Gate 3 will ship on two discs for PlayStation 5 owners, while the Xbox version will be on three discs. The PC version, on the other hand, will include DVD with a custom game installer and additionally includes a CD key for the Steam version.

Playable-on-disc? Must be the Baldur's Gate 3 - Deluxe Edition.
Preorder: https://t.co/LJJG5IGOG8
The Deluxe Edition for PS5, Xbox, and PC includes the Digital Deluxe edition, as well

title: Madame Web Trailer's "He Was In The Amazon With My Mom" Line Is An Internet Hit
description:
The recently released Madame Web trailer introduces an origin story setup for the eponymous character along with multiple Spider-Woman characters--including Sydney Sweeney as Julia Carpenter. But what people might remember the most from the video is Dakota Johnson's delivery of a line by Cassandra Webb: "He was in the Amazon with my mom when she was researching spiders right before she died."

The internet quickly turned the Madame Web dialogue into a meme. For instance, people shared how hilarious the line is when coming from other famous movie characters, like Luther in Mission: Impossible or even at the end of Chinatown. Check out some of our favorites below:

Ethan, he was in the Amazon with my mom when she was researching spiders right before she died pic.twitter.com/n4pvN7iavU

— Lon Harris (@Lons)

title: Mortal Kombat 1 Dev Breaks Down Omni-Man
description: Design Manager at Netherrealm Studio, Nick Nicastro, sat down with GameSpot to go over Mortal Kombat 1's latest fighter Omni-Man's move set, his infamous fatality, and its many homages to the show Invincible.

title: Save Big On Destiny Collectibles At Amazon Ahead Of Black Friday
description:
Destiny 2 isn't just a great game, but also a fantastic source of stylish merchandise. While you won't see any exclusive raid jackets on sale during Black Friday, you can pick up some nice baubles--quite literally!--with the range of official Destiny 2 gear that's available. Several of these pieces have been discounted as well, and if you have a Destiny 2 fan at home, these make for thoughtful gifts to consider. Over at Amazon, you'll find replica statues, mini-recreations of some of the best Exotic armor in the game, and adorable plushies for sale.

Destiny 2 collectible statues

These statues have a nice mix of attrac

title: A Nightmare Come To Life, As Little Girl's Teddy Bear Becomes Evil In First Trailer For Imaginary
description:
Blumhouse and Lionsgate have revealed the first trailer for Imaginary, a horror movie featuring a cute little teddy bear who is not all they seem.

In Imaginary, a woman (DeWanda Wise) moves back to her childhood home where she discovers a teddy bear that she loved as a child but did not bring with her when she moved out. The little bear, Chauncy, remembers, though, and it's very upset about being abandoned.

A little girl befriends the bear, who asks her to collect and do things for her, and, well, you can see where this is going. You can check out the very unsettling trailer below.

Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: All Elite Wrestling's Like A Dragon Gaiden Street Fight Brings A Video Game To Life
description:
Video games and professional wrestling are no strangers to one another, with wrestlers referencing their favorite games through ring attire, random trumpet songs, and more. Wednesday's episode of All Elite Wrestling Dynamite raised the bar, as the company presented a Like A Dragon Gaiden Street Fight, with eight wrestlers causing some Yakuza-themed mayhem.

Two teams of four--Chris Jericho, Paul Wight, Kota Ibushi, and Kenny Omega on one side, and Brian Cage, Konosuke Takeshita, Kyle Fletcher, and Will "Powerhouse" Hobbs" on the other--took part in the match, which spilled into the crowd, the backstage area, and even a private suite. Both teams wore gear referencing the Yakuza series--Kenny Omega sported the Ryu Ga Gotoku logo on his tights, while Konosuke Takeshita came dressed in

title: This Hilariously Broken New Hearthstone Card Is Already Getting Nerfed
description:
Hearthstone's new Showdown in the Badlands expansion launched this week, and it took just over a day for Blizzard to announce its first nerf. The Azerite Snake, a Warlock legendary card, will get a hotfix nerf soon, with details coming Friday. Blizzard game designer GallonHS announced the impending change on Twitter/X, calling the card a "clear sentiment outlier," which seems like a diplomatic way to say that the community is mad at this remarkably unbalanced card.

Howdy partners, hope y'all are enjoying the first few days of Showdown in the Badlands! We're planning on a hotfix nerf for The Azerite Snake, as it's a clear sentiment outlier. More details to come Friday 🤠 pic.twitter.com/tRgaoqqf3T

— Gallon (@GallonHS)

title: Remnant 2 Gets Rare Discount For Black Friday
description:
It has been an excellent year for video games so far, and chances are, you might have missed out on one of the best titles of the year between all of the big attention-grabbing releases. Remnant 2 is that game, a well-received and challenging action-RPG that mixes a souls-likes approach with post-apocalyptic vibes. It's on sale now during Black Friday month, and Amazon is offering a 26% discount on the PlayStation 5 version of the game. You can also save on the PC version of the sequel. If you'd like to try out the original game on Switch, there's a pretty good deal available for it as well.

  • Remnant 2 (PS5) -- $37 ($50)
  • Remnant 2 (PC) -- $35 ($50)

title: The Best Sony Noise-Canceling Headphones Receive Big Discount For Black Friday
description: If you're in the market for a pair of noise-canceling headphones with superb audio and comfort, Sony's WH-1000X series should definitely be on your list. The flagship headphones have been one of the top noise-canceling options on the market for years, and right now you can save big on the latest model: the Sony WH-1000XM5. The XM5 headphones are discounted to $328 at Amazon for Black Friday 2023; you can choose from black, blue, or silver models. Alternatively, you can grab the XM4 headphones--which are still awesome--for $265 (down from $350) in black and $262 in silver.

title: Get Free PC Game Pass With GeForce Now When You Sign Up For Ultimate Tier
description:
Nvidia has announced a nice new perk for people considering signing up for a GeForce Now Ultimate membership. The company is now bundling three months of PC Game Pass into the membership when people six up for a six-month subscription to GeForce Now Ultimate.

Ultimate costs $100 for six months. For that price, members can play games over the cloud that are running on PC with an RTX 4080 card. Members can stream games at up to 4K resolution and up to 120FPS. There is an eight-hour session length limit, but members can start a new session as many times as they want on a given day.

Sign up for GeForce Now Ultimate

The nice perk of PC Game Pass means members can stream anything that's in the PC Game Pass, including Starfield, Halo Infinite, Deathloop, Forza Motorsport, and many more. Nvidia said the offer for three months of PC Game Pass is only available fo

title: The Last Faith Has Major Castlevania Vibes, Available Now
description:
The Last Faith is a 2D, Metroidvania-styled, Soulslike in a wintery and horrific gothic world. It's now available on console and PC.

In the constellation of its genre, The Last Faith is distinctly Castlevania-tinged. However, rather than a straightforward quest to kill Dracula, protagonist Eryk must explore the margins of a disturbing world to discover the secrets behind his ailing memory and decaying conscience. Eryk's journey will put him in conflict with ancient gods and mysterious religious orders. As you explore, you'll find a variety of new tools to traverse the landscape and battle enemies, like spells, firearms, and melee weapons. You'll even obtain new weapons and special abilities from bosses.

With these tools, you can customize Eryk to suit your combat tastes and level up specific attributes to strengthen your build. Weapons and attack also appear to have elemental properties, like fire, lightning, or blood. As in Bloodborne, you can stagger enemies with spe

title: Lego 2K Drive Is On Sale For 50% Off For Black Friday
description:
We've had some great racing games this year, but for something different that fires on all precisely engineered plastic blocks, Lego 2K Drive is hard to beat. A mix of open-world racing in the same vein as Forza Horizon mixed with kart racing action, this delightful game just got a massive discount for Black Friday.

See at Amazon

For the current-gen versions on PS5 and Xbox Series X, Lego 2K Drive is available for $35, while the Switch, PS4, and Xbox One versions are marked down to $30. The game normally retails for $60-$70, so getting a 50% discount is a pretty big savings here. In case you missed it when it first launched in May this year, Lego 2K Drive is a toyetic racing game that makes excellent use of the Leg

title: Payday 3 Recouped Development Costs In 9 Days, Despite Issues
description:
Payday 3 launched in September, but the release was marred with serious server issues. What impact those issues have had on the game are not totally clear. As part of publisher Starbreeze's latest earnings report, the company said the game performed ahead of expectations in terms of "initial" game sales. Starbreeze also said it has already made its money back off the game.

Starbreeze said Payday 3 has "reached recoup." That's not a big surprise, though, as the game was fully funded prior to launch thanks to a €50 million deal with Koch Media.

Koch Media owner Embracer, however, says Payday 3 did no

title: Man Who Attacked Nancy Pelosi's Husband Says Anti-Feminist Gaming YouTubers Radicalized Him
description:
David DePape, who assaulted former US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's husband Paul, has stated that anti-feminist gaming content on YouTube led him to radicalization.

A report from KQED quotes DePape's testimony on the third day of the federal trial against him, in which he described the process of his radicalization. DePape claimed that he once politically opposed Trump, until he began consuming right-wing conspiracy media. DePape was an avid gamer who encountered videos about the misogynistic harassment campaign Gamergate while looking up walkthroughs and tips.

DePape said, "I’d look up a [strategy to defeat a video game] boss, and it’d be a total different person, and these people would talk about how toxic Anita Sarkeesian is, over and over and over. I wanted to find out what was going on here. I wanted to get both sides of the story.

title: Alan Wake II Story & Ending Explained
description: Alan Wake 2 presents a twisting story, one that's a convoluted mystery, altered by the otherworldly power of the supernatural Dark Place and the writings of Alan Wake himself. So we're gonna explain everything that happened, what it implies for the future, and everything you might have missed.

title: See Dark And Darker's Mobile Gameplay In New Footage
description:
Dark and Darker, the popular fantasy dungeon adventure game, is coming to mobile--and the first gameplay footage has now arrived.

Some might have been wondering how Dark and Darker's gameplay mechanics and systems would translate on mobile, and now we have a first look. Take a peek at the video below to see Dark and Darker's combat, exploration, menus, and systems in action.

Dark and Darker's mobile version is developed by Bluehole Studio and is slated for release on mobile devices in 2024. The game features five classes to choose from, including Fighter, Barbarian, Ranger, Rogue, and Cleric. The multiplayer survival extraction game features a mechanic called Darkswarm, which pushes players and other monsters closer and closer together. Players need to find an escape portal to get out with their loot and lives, or they'll lose everything.

title: The 20 Best-Selling Games Of 2023 In The US (So Far)
description:
Chart-toppers


2023 is coming to a close, and what a year it was. The year was marked with the release of a number of high-profile games like Starfield, The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, Spider-Man 2, Diablo IV, and lots more. 2

2023 was a fantastic year for big games, but it was also a year marked with significant layoffs at developers big and small. Some estimates put the total number of video game industry layoffs in 2023 beyond 6,000.

Which games sold the best in 2023? The year isn't over so we don't have the full picture just yet. But the research company Circana, formerly known as NPD, publishes an updated list of the best-selling games so far in 2023 each month. This helps us understand what the best-selling games are, even if the ranking is not perfect or necessarily complete.

For example, some companies do not

title: PS5 Owners Can Now Get Six Months Of Apple Music For Free
description:
Ahead of the winter holidays, Sony has announced a new special offer for PS5 owners: six months of Apple Music for free. The gift is available to claim for almost an entire year--through November 15, 2024--with the subscription service featuring over 100 million songs.

The PlayStation website notes that only "new and qualified returning subscribers" to Apple Music can grab this offer. If you meet that criteria, just download the app on your PS5 and read the directions.

Sony has also been sweetening the deal for potential new PS5 owners with a couple of cool bundles. For instance, Amazon has a slim PS5 Spider-Man 2 bundle for only $500 (usually costs $560). There is also

title: 2023's Apparent Biggest Mobile Game Launch Is Not What You Expect
description:
Game company Scopely has announced that its mobile game Monopoly Go has now raked in more than $1 billion in revenue, becoming 2023's "biggest mobile game launch," according to the company.

Scopely, which is owned by Saudi Arabia's Savvy Games, added that Monopoly Go is bringing in more than $200 million every month. Citing data.ai, Scopely went on to say that Monopoly Go reaching $1 billion in revenue after seven months on the market is faster than any other casual game in mobile game history. Monopoly Go is a free game that makes money through microtransactions, as is the way many mobile games handle monetization.

The mobile game market is bigger and more lucrative than console and PC. Part of the reason why Microsoft bought Activision Blizzard was to get a foothold in the mobile market with

title: Assassin's Creed Mirage Gets New Game Plus In December
description:
Ubisoft has announced that Assassin's Creed Mirage will receive a free update in December, and it will include New Game Plus and an optional permadeath mode.

"We hear you: New Game+ mode for Assassin's Creed Mirage will be available in a free update this December," Ubisoft said on Twitter. "And for the expert Assassins, along with NG+ will come an optional permadeath mode also available across all difficulties! More details to come soon."

Assassin's Creed Mirage was released back in October and it was Ubisoft's best-selling game during a launch period for the PS5 and Xbox Series X|S generation. Ubisoft also mentioned earlier this year that it had

title: 10 Months After Believing He Would Die, Jeremy Renner Is Running Uphill Again
description:
Jeremy Renner has marked ten months of recovery from his horrific snow plough accident with a video of himself running up and down his inclined driveway, as picked up by Variety. The Oscar-nominated actor's progress is impressive to say the least, after his horrific accident left him with over 30 broken bones, including both ankles, his right knee, and his left tibia.

The video shows Renner doing exercises on his driveway, which he says is his "first attempt at any of this activity, especially at steep grade." He also thanks fans for their support over the course of his recovery so far, as well as leaving a message for family and friends.

title: Marvel's What If...? Gets Season 2 Trailer, Release Date
description:
The next season of Marvel's animated speculative fiction show What If...? is arriving just in time for the holidays--with an interesting new release schedule. Starting on December 22, fans will be able to check out a new What If...? episode every day for nine days, spanning the peak holiday period.

What If...? is an animated series from Marvel that explores things that could have happened, but didn't come to pass in its actual canon. The trailer shows off some of the scenarios that we already knew were coming in season 2--the cast of Shang-Chi doing battle with Asgard's Odin, Iron Man street racing on Sakaar, and a dip into a historical, Renaissance-inspired setting in a story based off Neil Gaiman's 1602 series.

The second season of What If...? is also introducing a new hero, a Mohawk woman named Kahhori who comes into contac

title: PlayStation Plus Extra And Premium Games For November Are Here
description:
A new group of games is coming to PlayStation Plus' Extra and Premium tiers from Tuesday November 21. One new title is already available, and it's a day-one drop for PlayStation Plus: Teardown, a demolition heist game which is available to Extra and Premium subscribers from November 15.

As a day one title, Teardown is PlayStation's headline game for the month. The demolition sandbox game launched on PC last year, but is brand new to the PS5, coming to PS Plus Extra and Premium on the same day it launched. Teardown is the only November game that is solely for the PS5.

Both Premium and Extra subscri

title: PlayStation VR 2 Bundle Gets Big Discount Ahead Of Black Friday
description: PlayStation VR 2 just received a rare outright discount as part of Dell's early Black Friday 2023 offers. You can save $100 on a PSVR 2 bundle that comes with Horizon Call of the Mountain, the VR-exclusive entry in PlayStation's popular Horizon series. This PSVR 2 deal is only available at Dell, and we wouldn't be surprised to see it sell out. Most of Dell's console bundle deals disappear fairly quickly, though right now you can also get a free $75 gift card with the Nintendo Switch OLED.
